xwikidoc.name: FindAndRemoveAssets
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.dward
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.LudovicDubost
xwikidoc.content: #set($sql = "") #set ($sql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.AssetClass' and (doc.web = 'AssetTemp' or doc.web like 'Coll_%') and (doc.fullName like '% %' or doc.fullName like '%?%' or doc.fullName like '%+%')") #set ($list = $xwiki.searchDocuments($sql , 20, 0)) #foreach($item in $list) ## #set($assetdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($item)) * $item [Find ID>Admin.CheckDB?name=$item] ## -> $assetdoc.fullName ## $assetdoc.delete() #end
